title: Please Is it also possible to reorganize as you wish the applications present in the main menu ?
content:
I want reorganize my menu apps (not homescreen) by creating my own folders, moove apps where I want, sorting them in the order that I want or in the number of lines and columns that I want desired (4x8, 4Ã—4...)

For me it's quite bushy and tight, I would like to space the applications of each other and classify them as I want. But it's impossible. Yet all other android phones do it
